TopicTitle: Game wont load on Epic Games

Articles.Content:
For some reason the game will open but it will remain a white screen, I got It on Epic Games (not Steam) I've tryed to verify the files, uninstall and reinstall the game and nothing has worked.

Edited January 5, 2023 by ZachPlaysEG
i have the same problem, and i can not run the game as administrator, how i proceed?
Yup same for me cant seem to find the laucher or anything and cant even uninstall it strange anyone got a fix please let us know i also got it on epic

Sorry to hear you are having problems and while I don't have the Epic version you could try navigating to the KSP install folder and right clicking on KSP_x64.exe, click the compatibility tab and select Run this program as administrator. Then try starting the game from KSP_x64.exe. This should bypass the launcher.

Edited March 4, 2023 by James Kerman
Added last line.
